ðŸ‘‹ Hi there, for issues that could be related to cannon itself or threejs etc, please consider using [github discussions](https://github.com/pmndrs/use-cannon/discussions). Documentation of libraries within the ecosystem can be found at <https://docs.pmnd.rs>.

Additionally, issues related to the debug view may belong in [cannon-es-debugger](https://github.com/pmndrs/cannon-es-debugger).
